Title: The Huaxu Hive: Everything You Need to Know!
Text:
THREAD: Why does the Department of Laboratory Evaluation work overtime every day?

LILI
The Department of Laboratory Evaluation people are working every day overtime!! For what? Guilt-tripping us all into working overtime, too?

KingofSlavingoff
Yeah why do they work so late? Are they getting extra overtime or what?

Greenriver2727
The Department of Laboratory Evaluation just can't seem to hit their target goals, despite receiving additional subsidies! And don't even get me started on the department of water and electricity - they're a complete joke

LILI
For real? How did you know? Is the Lab Evaluation Department swamped catching up on this quarter's schedule?

TurtsStew
Heard they've even offered to test Liu Qing's latest product to see if it improves work efficiency. I think it's called something like... Lemonblast?

KingofSlavingoff
I've heard of that thing! Said to keep you awake all day with just one pill!

OrphanAccount11
I swear it works! I've finished three papers in a row with the help of Blasting Mints! DM me for a discounted price, first-come, first-served. Let's ace this together!
[ATTACHMENT: Lemonblast.jpg]

Admin_Willow
Promotion of trial-period medical products is strictly prohibited here. It will result in an immediate ban.

KingofSlavingoff
RIP bro

LILI
The admin strikes again!
